remarks: Closure of vector addition for a semiring left module.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)
statement:
slmdvacl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
slmdvacl.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
slmdvacl $p |- ( ( W e. SLMod /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. V ) $.
